mcq.statement: What does the idiom 'Don't put all your eggs in one basket' advise?

options.a: To focus all efforts on a single task
options.b: To distribute your resources or efforts among various places
options.c: To save resources for the future

mcq.one_liner: The idiom 'Don't put all your eggs in one basket' suggests that one should not concentrate all efforts or resources in one area as one could lose everything.
